title: Average On-Campus Room and Board Charges by Sector, 2000–01 to 2016–17, in 2016 dollars

metadata.notes: Institutions are weighted by full-time undergraduate fall enrollment. Based on published room and board from IPEDS for 2000-01 through 2014-15 and percentage increase from 2014-15 to 2015-16 from Ma et al, Trends in College Pricing 2015, The College Board.
metadata.source:
Based on published room and board costs from IPDES for 2000–01 through 2014–15 and the percentage increase from 2014–15 to 2016–17 from Jennifer Ma, Sandy Baum, Matea Pender, and Meredith Welch, Trends in College Pricing 2016 (New York: College Board, 2016).
Note: Institutions are weighted by full-time equivalent undergraduate fall enrollment.
